section.name: Introduction
section.p: MyDoggy is an IntelliJ Idea like docking framework for managing secondary windows within the main window. MyDoggy allows to move, resize or extract those secondary windows. Also, MyDoggy provides support for content management of the main window.

subsection.name: Module Separation
subsection.p:
Team communication is an essential part of any project. And wasting time looking for technical project information can be costly and frustrating. Clearly, any IT project will benefit from having its own dedicated technical web site. Some useful things it provides are:
Online javadoc
Quality assurance
Static code audits with Checkstyle or PMD
Unit test reports
